atten3.ptxt: After turning the ignition switch off, waiting time may be required before disconnecting the cable from the battery terminal. Therefore, make sure to read the disconnecting the cable from the battery terminal notice before proceeding with work (See page ).

s-1.ptxt: DISCONNECT CABLE FROM NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

atten2.ptxt: Wait at least 90 seconds after disconnecting the cable from the negative (-) battery terminal to disable the SRS system.

atten3.ptxt: When disconnecting the cable, some systems need to be initialized after the cable is reconnected (See page ).

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 1 PARKING BRAKE CABLE ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Disconnect the No. 1 parking brake cable from the parking brake lever (See page ).
Remove the 2 bolts and No. 1 heat insulator.
Remove the No. 1 clip and pin from the No. 3 parking brake cable.
Disconnect the No. 1 parking brake cable from the No. 3 parking brake cable.
Disconnect the No. 1 parking brake cable from the parking brake equalizer.
Remove the bolt holding the No. 1 parking brake cable.
Remove the No. 1 parking brake cable clamp from the No. 1 parking brake cable.
Disconnect the No. 1 parking brake cable from the cable support bracket.
Disconnect the No. 1 parking brake cable from the cable support bracket.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 2 PARKING BRAKE CABLE ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Disconnect the No. 2 parking brake cable from the parking brake shoe lever RH and backing plate RH.

s3.ptxt: Disconnect the No. 2 parking brake cable from the parking brake shoe lever (See page ).

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s3.ptxt: Remove the 2 bolts and disconnect the No. 2 parking brake cable from the backing plate.

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 bolts and No. 2 heat insulator.
Disconnect the No. 2 parking brake cable from the parking brake equalizer.
Remove the 4 bolts and No. 2 parking brake cable.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 3 PARKING BRAKE CABLE ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Disconnect the No. 3 parking brake cable from the parking brake shoe lever LH and backing plate LH.

s3.ptxt: Disconnect the No. 3 parking brake cable from the parking brake shoe lever (See page ).
Remove the 2 bolts and disconnect the No. 3 parking brake cable from the backing plate.

s2.ptxt: Remove the 4 bolts, nut and No. 3 parking brake cable.
